thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 18 of 259
thread.title: Janet

author: Janet
title: Janet
text: It's always interesting to see the products and experiences offered. I have purchased and been very satisfied and occasionally not been all that satisfied. However, I do appreciate the process that Goupon offers and the significant savings. I still receive the e-mails and occasionally search the site for what I am needing. Rarely am I disappointed with the search. There is inevitably a product that meets the need. Thank you.
